item.title: Overwatch: Queen of CHEESE Comp - Orisa Advanced Guide

meta.summary:
b"Orisa Overwatch Gameplay fits comfortably into the slow rez meta we're currently in. Her kit can feel unimpactful if you're unsure what her strengths are, but when focused she can be a serious maintank threat that can really throw the enemy off. Albeit a odd and different maintank style, one that fits better in the backline, with these tactics you can comfortably hold positioning and really be a nuisance to dislodge on either attack or defense depending on the map. item.title: Orisa - From Beginner to Advanced in 20 Steps

meta.summary:
b"Hello everyone, took me a while to make this one but these insights pretty much cover everything you need to know regarding how to improve your Orisa game including how to play against her.

The tips 1-10 are going to be building your fundamentals
The tips 11-20 are going to be advanced, building on top of the foundation that you acquire from the first ones.
And the tips 16-20 are going to be focus on positioning, which is essential, those are the tips that will keep you going and continue to provide value throughout the match.

+ the only crucial thing that i would like to add to the mechanics of Orisa is this:

Try throwing your Halt a bit up/vertical, so when a fast opponent (e.g. Lucio, Genji, Tracer, Sombra) is cought with your Halt - they will not reach the floor alive, because it allows you to easily land all the shots as they are falling down. This completely nullifies any of the speed they have due to them being stuck mid-air and unable to dodge your bullets this way.

Anyways, let's get to it. Enjoy and let me know if you found it useful

Check out the latest video:
1 Guide To Rule Them All - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MJuWQ1yYC0A

[Coaching]:
If you want to get coached 1 on 1 I am an Overwatch coach at gamersensei and you can book a lesson with me anytime here

item.title: Overwatch: How to Be a PRO Orisa - Halt Combos Advanced Guide

meta.summary:
b"Orisa is a legit main tank playstyle after her last buff to enabling her turret playstyle, but a lot of the success comes from utilzing halt to either crowd control the enemy, or better yet, set up for cool combo's for your team to capitalize on. Halt + Hook was a very powerful force for South Korea, the crowd control Orisa-game on maps with environmental kills is key as well - and even more can be done to combo abilities with halt, even at longer ranges. item.title: How GRANDMASTER Players DESTROY With ORISA | MIRO - Overwatch Season 7 Competitive Guide

meta.summary:
b'Today we are back again trying a top 500 tip Orisa video because I think its fun and people just love Orisa it seems. Today we are talking about how the grandmaster Orisa player can carry his competitive games in season 7 overwatch competitive ranked mode guide for overwatch season 7 placement matches and overwatch season 7 changes. Going over some Orisa season 7 tips and guide or whatever you want to call it. thanks! 




More Videos! : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLefC4eOMnbRF5Xm7uCjfU73bh0ybup9Df



Gameplay: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z7-vquGf8ww
Thumbnail: https://i.pinimg.com/736x/f8/38/7d/f8387dfa018ad1c59d108bb31b2663b1--wallpaper-overwatch-overwatch-fanart.jpg
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



======================================================================

TIPS I WROTE DOWN FROM THE VIDEO:
-Orisa is finally meta, has one of the highest winrates in the game
-She is broken in cheese comps and spam comps, but even works with hitscan comps well
-always take high ground and spam from there
-if shield goes down, tank for your dps with shift
-Dva can spam well with your shield, and block burst that destroys your shield
---The first point they do pretty terrible and dont get enough kills, but last point is a great hold
-spam wth your shield around corners
-When close up, use alt fire to get easier headshots
-put your shield far ahead while pushing up, put it up for teammates not yourself
-if you can kill a support in a fight shoot at them, otherwise just target the tanks
-use your ult at the start of the fight, its a waste to use at any other time
-shoot to where your targets neck will probably be once they move up
-use alt fire to make so enemy can never abuse high ground vs you
-combo your alt fire with junkrat mines for a billion ult charge for junkrat
-stay as a frontline tank even if one guy sneaks onto the point, dont tunelvision

-put your shield up early to setup on, and tank shots for your bastion
-junkrat cannot destroy your shield by himself, you can outspam him in they play slowly
-shoot at the enemy orisa shield at all times when you cant hit anybody
-callout when you are going for the minigrav so people can get the free picks
-its hard for you to push out in the open, just keep trying to poke with teammates until you get a pick
-always stay behind, next to, or on the point. He is never doing anything else
-shoot at the enemy bastion first, you destroy bastion with your damage as you cant miss a shot
-the second you get ressed put down a shield to save your mercy



======================================================================





What is overwatch?: Well overwatch is Blizzards new take on the fps genre. In this game you choose a hero or "Class" to take on enemies, push payloads, and take control points. The point of the game is to beat the other team over and it is indeed a whole bunch of fun to play. The game includes 27 heroes so far and Is a blast to play. In this video I mostly go over playing it in a commentary type of manner, and these types of videos will usually be overwatch live commentaries or overwatch group commentaries. As well expect a few guides of this game in the future and some box openings as well. Anyways, hope you enjoy blizzards new hit!'

Who is JoeKing aka me. Im a overwatch youtuber that likes to talk about character updates, how to get better, and the competitive community. Trying to help you get better at overwatch and entertain at the same time hopefully. How GRANDMASTER Players DESTORY with Orisa - Overwatch Top 500 PRO Tricks Overwatch - 20 TricksOrisa Grandmasters ABUSE That You Don't! Some tips and tricks to master Orisa! Overwatch - 7 OP Tips and Tricks Grandmaster Players use every game! Orisa overwatch, Orisa guide top 500 tips and tricks Orisa master gameplay, how Orisa is played, shadowburn gameplay Orisa overwatch competitive esports vod grandmaster Orisa tricks grandmaster top 500 Orisa, overwatch top 700 Orisa esports vod Orisa esports gameplay, grandmaster Orisa tricks top 500 tricks tips, how to play Orisa, Orisa season 7, overwatch competitive season 7 Orisa, Orisa season 7 offense, Orisa season 7 defense, overwatch season 7 Orisa guide overwatch,Orisa tricks,Tricks Orisa Grandmasters ABUSE That You Don't,Tricks Orisa Grandmasters ABUSE That You Don't overwatch,overwatch Tricks Orisa Grandmasters ABUSE That You Don't,tricks grandmasters abuse that you dont,overwatch tricks grandmasters abuse that you dont,grandmaster tricks overwatch,Orisa grandmaster,Orisa top 500 trick,How GRANDMASTER Players DESTROY with Orisa,Orisa season 7 competitive,Orisa vod,grandmaster, Orisa seagull, seagull Orisa, best Orisa, strongest Orisa, best Orisa player, overwatch seagull

item.title: Overwatch Orisa Aim Tutorial Guide | How To Play Orisa Drills For Improvement OwDojo

meta.summary:
b"--~--
Orisa aiming guide + tips and tricks about her abilities. Learn how to land your shots with her, master your aim with these drills. We are going to show you how to practice controlling her abilities (the Halt! and barrier) in order to be the most effective in a team.

Orisa has a high DPS for a tank, but she can go down quickly if handled incorrectly. By training your Orisa aim and drilling how to control other aspects of her play, you will be able to utilize her to the fullest potential. These are basic drills, exercises that you can do to build your basics with Orisa.

Drill sheet: https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B6X5OZ2NG04pajY4NXhpU2tqVU0

item.title: Overwatch | Top 10 Mistakes Orisa Players Make

meta.summary:
b"With Orisa now in the competitive scene. We put together our top 10 mistakes that players make about Orisa. This includes playing her, playing against her and playing with one on your team. Overwatch's latest hero isn't the strongest pick in the game but she's definitely not the weakest so we wanted to highlight some misconceptions as well as give some tips to utilize the omnic.

item.title: How To Actually Play Orisa

meta.summary:
b"Please enjoy this thoughtful and intriguing Orisa guide, stay tuned for more goodies coming soon
Animator's twitter: https://twitter.com/GummyDona
My own twitter: https://twitter.com/mikasacus

To add an extra word, don't be hung up about the month bit, it could be sooner, it could be a month, or it could be a month and a bit, really it depends on what kind of schedule blizzard adds to the game

I think Jeff Kaplan is one of the most brilliant game developer minds alive today
